downloadTitle: Skype for Business Online, Windows PowerShell Module
downloadDescription: Module that allows use of Windows PowerShell to manage Skype for Business Online deployments. The latest Teams PowerShell public release is integrated with Skype for Business Online Connector, providing a single module for Teams PowerShell management.
detailsSection: Skype for Business Online, Windows PowerShell Module allows management of a Skype for Business Online deployment and Skype for Business Online user accounts through the use of Windows PowerShell. Teams PowerShell public release is here
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating Systems

Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit, Windows Server 2008 R2, Window Server 2012, Window Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2016

Pre-requisites

In order to use Skype for Business Online, Windows PowerShell Module to manage Skype for Business Online deployments you must also install the following:
  1. Windows PowerShell 5.1
    See https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=54616 for download details.
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the link below and saving the file to your hard disk.
  2. Double-click the program file on your hard disk to start the Setup program.
  3. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation on the desktop.

To remove the download file:
  1. To remove the download file, delete the SkypeOnlinePowershell.exe file saved to your hard disk.

To uninstall this program: Teams PowerShell public release
  1. Go to the control panel and remove the application “Skype for Business Online, Windows PowerShell Module” from Add or Remove programs

Help Documentation:
  1. For additional information on how to use the Skype for Business Online, Windows PowerShell Module to manage Skype for Business Online deployments, see the help documentation here.
